intro: Glossopetalum, commonly known as the "buttercup plant," is a genus of flowering plants in the family Crassulaceae. These plants are characterized by their fleshy, succulent leaves and showy, often yellow or orange flowers. Glossopetalum species are often used in rock gardens and as ornamental plants due to their drought tolerance and attractive appearance.
